Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD!
Reviews.Author: Sultan
Reviews.Content: For the newbie in Photographing it is the best match! Package, kit includes and outfit, everything is perfect! THANK you!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: For the money this is a fantastic camera. 24.2mp, easy to use and with some practice I have taken pictures that look better then the professional "belly" pictures which cost 175 dollars for 6.I bought this because I was expecting my first child and couldn't be happier

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Gerald D. Zoli
Reviews.Content: Camera is very easy to use.  Takes great pictures and movies are easy to film and download.  I recommend I you enjoy taking pictures this camera is as good as the Canon I had.
